group_1.textRight: That far enough?
I think we lost her...maybe?

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry. I know you were just trying to@help us.
Still, you didn't have to run away with us.

group_1.textRight: I couldn't just leave ya there! [chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]Besides,@Kazumi's your friend, right?
Plus, it's so awful that she's the one@attacking you...
Why would she do that?

group_1.textLeft: That's what we've been trying to figure out.

group_1.textRight: Oh, okay... Still, I'm pretty surprised that@she's a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: How do you know Kazumi? Did you really meet@her?

group_1.textRight: I did, I did! [chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]It was really sudden!

So I found her sleeping, right? [chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100301:motion_400][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]Out of@nowhere, she jumped up and started yelling!
And she was like, "I'm staaarvinnng..." She@scarfed down some fried rice and then left.

group_1.textLeft: Ha ha... Classic Kazumi! Yeah, that's gotta@be her.

group_1.textRight: But I didn't get the sense that she's a@Magical Girl at all.
Then again...she didn't give any indication@she'd start attacking people, either.

group_1.textLeft: Back there... That wasn't Kazumi.

group_1.textRight: Huh? But you said...

group_1.textLeft: I know, but...it's not her!
It just can't be Kazumi...

group_1.textRight: We don't really know what's going on, either.

group_1.textLeft: She looked like Kazumi, but everything about@her was totally off!

group_1.textRight: Something must have happened to her...
Which means that girl who attacked us isn't@really her!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's not the Kazumi we know and@love...
Our Kazumi is completely different...

group_1.textRight: Uuuoooh! I'm getting all dizzy!

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, we didn't want you to attack her@before we knew what was wrong!
Sorry... I know what we're saying is@ludicrous.

group_1.textRight: Uuuuuungh!
Okay, got it!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?! You did?! R-really?

group_1.textRight: This town is full of weird stuff that doesn't@make sense!
Something like this is just part of everyday@life for me...
The way to figure out what's happening@is way easier than you'd expect.
Basically, what we do is...
1...Look into what happened.@2...Don't act until we know what's up.
That's it!

group_1.textLeft: Th-that makes sense!
(Part of everyday life... I see...)
(This city seems worlds apart from how@things are in Asunaro City.)

group_1.textRight: Okay! So, what do we do now? I'll help@however I can!

group_1.textLeft: What, really?!

group_1.textRight: I'm on this ship for the long haul now...
I really like the true Kazumi, too!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you! We graciously accept your help!
We came here from Asunaro, so we don't@know very much about this city at all...

group_1.textRight: Asunaro City! No wonder I've never seen @you guys before!

group_1.textLeft: I'm Umika Misaki.
Kaoru Maki, here!

group_1.textRight: I'mâ€”

group_1.textLeft: Tsuruno Yui...right?

group_1.textRight: Whoa! How'd you know?!

group_1.textLeft: You told us before...

group_1.textRight: Oh, yeah, I did! Hehe...
So what do we do now?

group_1.textLeft: Well, now that we have you, Miss...

group_1.textRight: Call me Tsuruno!

group_1.textLeft: All right! Now that we've met you, Tsuruno...
There are many things we'd like to ask you @about Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: Go right ahead! You can ask me anything!

group_1.textLeft: That other Kazumi might find us any@moment if we stay here, though...

group_1.textRight: Hmmm...
Well then, I have the perfect place where@we can talk!
